description:
** Enjoy a Fun and Safe Fireworks Party at Home **

** #1 Bestseller Fireworks iPad App in US During New Year's Eve **
** #1 Bestseller Fireworks iPad App in US During 4th of July **

** Featured on AppAdvice Under 4th of July Apps **
** Featured on AppleNApps Under Best Apps To Celebrate Independence Day **
** Featured on AppJudgement Under Top Apps for Best 4th of July **
** Featured on FirstCoastNews as App of the Day **
** Featured on iTunes Under Hot Entertainment iPad Apps in U.S. **

AppAdvice on 07/04/2012:
"Real Fireworks Artwork 4-in-1 is the most realistic fireworks simulator out there (sound effects included)."

AppleNApps on 07/04/2012:
"A Fireworks app that offers the best simulated fireworks on iOS."

AppSafari on 01/02/2012:
"INNOVATTY, LLC has done a fantastic job with the graphics and audio; it is almost like viewing an actual fireworks show."

From the creators of Geometrica Visualizer comes Real Fireworks Artwork 4-in-1 app; The most realistic fireworks app designed mainly for iPad, taking advantage of its graphics capabilities to create a spectacular and mesmerizing fireworks show like never seen before. The app is also an interactive visualizer that responds smoothly and beautifully to swipe gesture. Moreover, the app allows for screenshot capture giving users the ability to create stunning and cool wallpapers. Last and not least, the app is an amazing drawing pad that allows for creating awesome artwork with different colors and glow. The whole family will enjoy it.

The best user experience can be achieved when connecting the New iPad or iPad 2 to a TV using TV-Out kit or Apple TV.  A demo video is available on our YouTube channel. Visit Developer Web Site for more information or see link below. 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZQ1XsBq1XcA

Get this app now and start have fun ...


Main Features:
- Customizable Realistic Fireworks Show 
- Interactive and Fun Visualizer 
- Cool Wallpapers Maker 
- Amazing Drawing Pad 

Other Features:
- Screenshot Capture and Sharing
- Support All Device Orientations 
- Smooth Graphics
- Awesome Glow
- Multi-Color 
- Easy to Use 
- TV Out (iPad 2 or Later)

Controls:
- Presettings
- Color Mode
- Tail Length
- Fireworks Size
- Particles Size
- Gravity
- Auto-Play
- Touch Glow
- Sticky Touch
- Auto-Lock
- Fireworks Sound

Sharing:
- Twitter
- Facebook
- Instagram
- Tumblr
- Flickr
- Email

Visit our website:
http://www.innovatty.com

Join us on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/innovatty

Follow us on Twitter:
http://www.twitter.com/innovatty

Join us on YouTube:
http://www.youtube.com/innovatty

releaseNotes:
Special thanks to all the users who gave us feedback!

More updates are coming soon. 

Stay Tuned! 

Enjoy The App 

Thank You ...
